name: Foot inversion
text: Foot inversion is produced primarily by tibialis anterior and tibialis posterior.

name: Foot dorsiflexion
text: Foot dorsiflexion is produced by tibialis anterior, extensor digitorum longus, and extensor hallucis longus.

name: Foot eversion
text: Foot eversion is produced primarily by fibularis longus and fibularis brevis.

name: Foot plantar flexion
text: Foot plantar flexion is produced by the gastrocnemiusâ€“soleus complex, flexor digitorum longus, flexor hallucis longus, and tibialis posterior.
